item.title: Reality conditions for sine-Gordon equation and quasi-periodic solutions in finite phase spaces
item.description: arXiv:2501.07862v3 Announce Type: replace Abstract: Quasi-periodic solutions of the sine-Gordon equation are expressed in terms of $\wp_{1,2g-1}$-function, and reality conditions are completely determined. This new result leads to computation and graphical representation of non-linear wave solutions. A way of obtaining finite-gap solutions by means of algebro-geometric integration is exposed in detail, as well as the construction of the sine-Gordon hierarchy on coadjoint orbits of the loop group of $\mathrm{SU}(2)$.
item.dc:creator: Julia Bernatska
